p: The population of the LTDB experienced slight growth, from 57.24 million in 2010 to 60.91 million in 2018 ( R 2 = 0.861, p < 0.001; Figure 2A). Additionally, the LTDB experienced rapid GDP growth, from 4290.5 billion RMB (681.1 billion USD) in 2010 to 8746.2 billion RMB (1388.2 billion USD) in 2018 ( R 2 = 0.990, p < 0.001; Figure 2B), representing a more than a 2-fold increase.
